overview_of_class:
Chemical analysis of real samples using basic laboratory techniques, including titration, colorimetric analysis, density measurements, and atomic spectroscopy. Planning, data collection, interpretation, and reporting on these experiments.

Chemistry 121-0 is the laboratory course associated with Chemistry 101-0.
name: General Chemistry Laboratory
title: WCAS CHEM 121-0-33 General Chemistry Laboratory
enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Co-Requisite: Students must also register for Chemistry 101-0.
Add both classes to the shopping cart and submit together for successful registration.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Chemical analysis of real samples using basic laboratory techniques, including titration, colorimetric analysis, density measurements, and atomic spectroscopy. Planning, data collection, interpretation, and reporting on these experiments.

Chemistry 121-0 is the laboratory course associated with Chemistry 101-0.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Students enrolled in Chemistry 121-0 MUST also enroll in Chemistry 101-0.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
1. Electronic Lab Notebook (details to be provided on or before first day of class) ($30)

2. Approved laboratory safety eyewear ($10)

3. 100% Cotton laboratory coat ($45)

Items 2 and 3 will be sold during the first week of classes. Details TBA.

subject: CHEM
